channel.title: Cal Poly Tip on Stat 150 at Cal Poly
channel.description: Recent content in Cal Poly Tip on Stat 150 at Cal Poly

item.title: Cal Poly Not-Pro Tip: Waffles
item.description: Are you wanting to save time doing your dreaded laundry? We’ll be sure to check the WASH alert website to see if there are washer and dryers available or how much time is left on each machine! Search “washlaundry.com/calpoly” and select your building location!

item.title: Cal Poly Not-Pro Tip: Waffles
item.description: At 805 Kitchen, to spice up your waffle, DO NOT grab toppings from the yogurt bar (chocolate chips, coconut flakes, etc) and add it into your waffle batter before cooking your waffle. There have been reports of severe allergic reactions where the ambulance has been required to come according to staff working there. If you want to up your waffle game, then please do it afterwards and simply add it to the finished waffle product.

item.title: Cal Poly Pro Tip: Shortcut
item.description: In the UU Plaza and need to get to Baker? Cut straight through Building 52 (Science) which is right across from Lucy’s and Poly Deli! It saves a lot of walking time and eliminates the hills!
